title: Shop Simulator: Supermarket
description:
SHOP SIMULATOR: SUPERMARKET – DESIGN, SELL & EXPAND – YOUR SUCCESS IS IN YOUR HANDS. Put your entrepreneurial skills to the test in Shop Simulator: Supermarket. Immerse yourself in the world of retail and start your own business today! Will your small shop become a successful supermarket ? It’s in your hands.
Playing with friends is even more fun. Coordinate your teammates , give orders via in-game voice chat, and fulfill your customers’ wishes . Together, you can make the supermarket of your dreams a success.
DIFFERENT BUSINESS OPPORTUNITIES
Decide what kind of shop you want to build. From a classic supermarket to a cereal shop with countless variations, or even a shop for animal food the choice is yours. S.T.A.L.K.E.R. 2: Heart of Chornobyl
DESIGN YOUR SHOP
Design your store exactly the way you want it. Choose from various shelves and decorations, place products as you like, and set their prices. Build the shop of your dreams !
MAXIMIZE YOUR PROFITS
Monitor stock levels, analyze sales data, and optimize your inventory to meet your customers’ needs. Keep an eye on market prices and order strategically to maximize your profits.
EXPAND AND GROW
Expand your shop and diversify your inventory to bring even more variety to your business. Hire employees to be able to focus on the critical aspects of your shop .

system_requirements.Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060, AMD Radeon RX 590
